name: Verger *PICO-8 prototype*
description:
Desperately threaded from ragged codescraps for 7DRL.

Wander rubble-strewn fields, slay beasts, burn grass, soak up magic water, devour eggplants, explode. Repeat.

Fully playable loop; probably a bit buggy. Going to expand this over the next couple months.

Thanks loads in advance for any feedback!
